title: Ethical Hacking
description: Learn about ethical hacking, its techniques, and its role in improving security.

questions.question: Which tool is commonly used for network penetration testing?
Which of the following is an example of social engineering?
What is a zero-day exploit?
options: An exploit discovered on the same day as the patch release
An exploit that has no known solution
An exploit found in outdated software
questions.correctAnswer: An exploit that has no known solution

questions.question: Which of these is a common method to protect against SQL injection?
What does a reverse shell do in penetration testing?
options: It sends a signal to the target machine
It establishes a connection from the target machine back to the attacker
It performs a brute force attack
questions.correctAnswer: It establishes a connection from the target machine back to the attacker

questions.question: What is the purpose of a vulnerability scanner?
options: To test the strength of passwords
To detect and report potential security weaknesses
questions.correctAnswer: To detect and report potential security weaknesses
